name: Sludge
description: You spew poisonous sludge at a target creature in range. Make a ranged attack, doing 1d10 + MOVE poison damage on a hit. The creature must make a CON save against your Move DC or become poisoned.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles the last Pokemon to act before the user.
